word: Bonjour! Je m'appelle Omar. J'étudie en France.
meaning: Hello! My name is Omar. I am studying in France.

category: Radio: Brief Encounter - Lily and Strangers
word: J'étudie à Paris. Je suis étudiant. J'étudie avec un professeur.
meaning: I am studying in Paris. I am a student. I am studying with a professor.

category: Radio: Brief Encounter - Lily and Strangers
word: Oui, je suis très heureux ici.
meaning: Yes, I am very happy here.
Are you studying or are you working?
Hello, Louis! Do you live here?

word: Non, j'habite en Angleterre. Et toi?
meaning: No, I live in England. And you?

word: J'habite à Paris. J'étudie à Bordeaux.
meaning: I live in Paris. I study in Bordeaux.
Yes. And you? Do you work.

word: Oui. Je travaille à Paris et à New York.
meaning: Yes. I work in Paris and in New York.

word: Je suis étudiente, j'aime la musique.
meaning: I am a student, I love music.

word: Très bien! J'aime la musique aussi.
meaning: Very good! I like the music too.
I live in the United States.
Okay, you live in the United States.

word: Euh... je prends le train maintenant...
meaning: Uh... I'm taking the train now...

word: Salut. J m’appelle Lisa. Et toi?
meaning: Hello. My name is Lisa. And you?

category: Radio: Names and Smells - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Je m'appelle Léo. Tu es étudiante?
meaning: My name is Léo. Are you a student?

category: Radio: Names and Smells - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oui j'étudie à une université américaine. Et toi, tu travailles?
meaning: Yes, I study at an American university. And you, do you work?

category: Radio: Names and Smells - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oui, je travaille ici en France.
meaning: Yes, I work here in France.

word: Tu es étudiante? Tu aimes étudier?
meaning: Are you a student? Do you like to study?
I am a student, I like to study.

word: Très bien! La pizza est très bonne.
meaning: Very good! The pizza is very good.
Hello Leo! Do you live here?

word: Oui, j'habite en France. Et toi?
meaning: Yes, I live in France. And you?

word: J'habite en Espagne. Tu travailles ici?
meaning: I live in Spain. Do you work here?

word: Non, je suis étudient. Et toi? Tu travailles?
meaning: No, I am a student. And you? Do you work?

word: Non, je suis étudiente aussi. Ah, tu étudies avec un professeur?
meaning: No, I'm a student too. Ah, are you studying with a professor?
Yes, and I study a lot.

word: Un magazine? En anglais ou en français?
meaning: A magazine? In English or in French?
Okay, a magazine. See you soon.
Hi, are you a student here?
I live in the United States.

word: Ah, c'est intéressant. Tu amies l'école?
meaning: Ah, that's interesting. Do you like school?

word: Très bien. Maintenant, tu travailles avec moi.
meaning: Very good. Now you work with me.

word: Ça va bien. Je m'appelle Zari.
meaning: I'm doing well. My name is Zari.
Yes, I am a student here.

word: Je m'appelle Eddy. Je suis professeur de sport! Bienvenue Zari!
meaning: My name is Eddy. I am a sports teacher! Welcome Zari!
My name is Lily. And you?
My name is Zari. Nice to meet you!

word: Enchantée. Oscar est professeur. Il travaille avec Eddy.
meaning: Delighted to meet you. Oscar is a teacher. He works with Eddy.
I study here. My name is Zari.

word: Je m'appelle Oscar. Je suis le professeur d'art...
meaning: My name is Oscar. I am the art teacher...

word: Oh! Mon café! Où est mon café?
meaning: Oh! My coffee! Where is my coffee?
Thank you! Welcome to class Zari!
